events.name: Grey Faction: The Fight Continues
events.description: Evan Anderson gives a presentation/lecture providing overview of Grey Faction and the path forward.

events.name: From the ISSTD to QAnon: mapping the evolution of the Satanic Panic
events.description: Presentation/lecture on the propagation of Satanic Panic conspiracy theories in QAnon.

events.name: Burning of the Green Witch
events.description: Burning of the Green Witch... aka the social history of Absinthe with Karl Kasarda.

events.name: Pasta Night
events.description: Creating the perfect pasta dish using dried pasta and seasonal ingredients with The Satanic Chef.

events.name: Dungeons & Dragons
events.description: Go through the askew painting on the Grand Staircase and wind through the catacombs to the abandoned crematorium. Friends and members of the Satanic Temple play the popular version of Dungeons & Dragons in the 1980s--First Edition D&D--in the way that everyone was afraid the game was being played back then. Players will get a chance to enjoy an expanded version of the Judges Guild classic old-school module, Inferno (by Geoffry O. Dale), in which characters must descend into the depths of Dante's Hell. But this time around, it's because they're on a rescue mission to release the Dark Prince from his frozen prison.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: GOATS!
events.description: Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
events.description: Meet Winston and Winona, Ada's beloved rabbits!
